clientRoles.title: Client Roles
clientRoles.subtitle: Manage client role types and their default settings.

create.title: Create Client Role
create.subtitle: Add a new client role type to the system.

form.title: Role Information
form.subtitle: Fill in the role details in all supported languages.

slug.label: Slug
slug.description: Unique identifier (lowercase, numbers, hyphens only). Cannot be changed after creation.

deliveryDays.label: Default Delivery Days
deliveryDays.description: Select the default delivery days for clients with this role.

errors.validation-error: Invalid form data. Please check your inputs.

errors.update-error: Failed to update role. Please try again.

delete.title: Delete Role
delete.subtitle: Permanently remove this role from the system.
delete.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the role "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
delete.cannotDeleteOne: This role cannot be deleted because it is used by {count} client.
delete.cannotDeleteMany: This role cannot be deleted because it is used by {count} clients.

errors.has-clients: Cannot delete role that is assigned to clients.
errors.delete-error: Failed to delete role. Please try again.
errors.unauthorized: You don't have permission to delete roles.

create.title: Create Client

form.title: Client Information
form.subtitle: Fill in the client details. An email will be sent to set up their password.

email.label: Email

email.descriptionEdit: Email cannot be changed after creation.

remise.label: Discount (%)
remise.description: Percentage discount applied to base prices.

billingAddress.title: Billing Address
billingAddress.different: Billing address is different from shipping address
billingAddress.differentDescription: Check this if the billing address differs from the shipping address

deliveryDays.label: Delivery Days
deliveryDays.description: Select the delivery days for this client. Defaults from role if not specified.

form.createSuccess: Client created successfully! A password setup email has been sent.

errors.update-error: Failed to update client. Please try again.

form.createSuccess: Employee created successfully! A password setup email has been sent.

employeeSettings.title: Platform Settings
employeeSettings.subtitle: Configure global platform settings such as order cutoff times and available permissions.

cutoffTime.label: Order Cutoff Time
cutoffTime.description: Time of day when orders must be placed (format: HH:mm). Orders placed after this time will be scheduled for the next delivery cycle.

cutoffDayOffset.label: Cutoff Day Offset
cutoffDayOffset.description: Number of days before delivery when orders must be placed. For example, if set to 1, orders must be placed 1 day before the delivery date.

defaultLocale.label: Default Locale
defaultLocale.description: Default language for the platform when no user preference is set.

vatRate.label: VAT Rate (%)
vatRate.description: VAT rate in percentage (e.g., 21 for 21% VAT).

availableLocales.label: Available Locales
availableLocales.description: Select which languages are available for users to choose from.

permissions.label: Available Permissions
permissions.description: Select which permissions are available for assignment to employee roles. Unchecked permissions will not be available when creating or editing employee roles.

units.label: Available Units
units.description: Select which measurement units are available for products. Unchecked units will not be available when creating or editing products.

errors.validation-error: Invalid form data. Please check your inputs.
errors.update-error: Failed to update settings. Please try again.
errors.unauthorized: You don't have permission to manage settings.

employeeProducts.title: Products
employeeProducts.subtitle: Manage product catalog, pricing, and visibility.
employeeProducts.noProducts: No products found. Create your first product to get started.

search.placeholder: Search products by name, SKU, or category...

filters.searchPlaceholder: Search products by name, SKU, or category...

create.title: Create Product
create.subtitle: Add a new product to the catalog.

form.title: Product Information
form.subtitle: Fill in the product details in all supported languages.

basePrice.label: Base Price
basePrice.description: Price per kg in euros (even if unit is piece, box, etc.).

unit.label: Unit
unit.description: Unit of measurement (e.g., kg, piece, box, bunch).

approximateWeight.label: Approximate Weight
approximateWeight.description: Approximate weight in kg (for items sold by piece but priced by weight).

imageUrl.label: Product Image
imageUrl.description: Upload an image for the product (JPEG, PNG, or WebP, max 5MB).

visibleTo.label: Visible To
visibleTo.description: Select which client roles can see this product. Leave all unchecked to make it visible to all clients.
visibleTo.allClients: Visible to all clients (no roles selected).

active.label: Active
active.description: Only active products are visible to clients.

errors.validation-error: Invalid form data. Please check your inputs.
errors.create-error: Failed to create product. Please try again.
errors.update-error: Failed to update product. Please try again.
errors.unauthorized: You don't have permission to perform this action.

delete.title: Delete Product
delete.subtitle: Permanently remove this product from the catalog.
delete.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the product "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
delete.cannotDelete: This product cannot be deleted because {count, plural, =1 {# order uses} other {# orders use}} it.

login.title: Sign in
login.subtitle: Enter your credentials to access your account.

errors.invalidCredentials: We couldn't find an account with those credentials.
errors.unknown: Something went wrong. Please try again.

setPassword.title: Set your password
setPassword.subtitle: Create a secure password for your account

errors.invalidLink: Invalid or expired invitation link. Please contact support.
errors.updateFailed: Failed to set password. Please try again.
errors.unknown: An error occurred. Please try again.

resetPassword.title: Reset password
resetPassword.subtitle: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
resetPassword.description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
resetPassword.successMessage: If an account exists with this email address, a reset link has been sent. Please check your inbox.
resetPassword.errorMessage: An error occurred. Please try again.

unauthorized.title: Unauthorized Access
unauthorized.description: You don't have permission to access this resource. Please contact an administrator if you believe this is an error.
